Package com.inamik.template.lib.main.actions

Class Summary
Capture Capture - Capture a template block and store it as a variable.
Else Else - A final (default) body-alt for body tags that suppot body-alts.
ElseIf ElseIf - Allows you to chain an {if} statement as a body-alt.
ElseUnless ElseIf - Allows you to chain an {unless} statement as a body-alt.
Foreach Foreach - Iterate over a container of items.
Foreach.ForeachId ForeachId
If If - Allows you to conditionally include a template body.
Include Include - Include a template, either from a file or a resource on the classpath.
Macro Macro - Capture a template block and store it as a Macro.
NewLine NewLine - Print a newline ("\n")to the template's output stream.
Print Print - Send data to the template's output stream.
Set Set - Set template variables.
Text Text - Capture a text block and store it as a variable.
Trim Trim - Capture a template block, trim it, and either print it or store it as a variable.
Unless Unless - Allows you to conditionally include a template body.
Unset Unset - Remove template variables.
Until Until - Allows you to continuously include a template body until a condition is met.
While While - Allows you to continuously include a template body while a condition is met.
